segments.text: Mrs . Phoebe , let's talk about the delivery arrangement for our goods .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What's your date of delivery ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I informed my company and was told that the first five thousand by the end of this month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about the balance of the order ? Can they also arrive at our company quickly ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can deliver the balance at the price already quoted in 10 days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am afraid we can not do that . Would you be willing to sign an annual contract on the basis we discussed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Possibly , subject to quality and delivery guarantees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . Well , in that case we could offer a 5 % discount for a confirmed monthly order for the next 12 months .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was looking forward to something a bit more substantial . As you know , we have long-time cooperation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid that's as far as we could go . We'd already be stretching ourselves to the limit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , let's shake on that and draw up the details of the contract .
segments.speaker: S2
